description: Fibonacci numbers - 3. Number of total preorders.
comments: Minimal cost of maximum height Huffman tree of size n. - Alex Vinokur (alexvn(AT)barak-online.net), Oct 25 2004
references: G. Kreweras, Les preordres totaux compatibles avec un ordre partiel. Math. Sci. Humaines No. 53 (1976), 5-30.
A. Sapounakis, I. Tasoulas and P. Tsikouras, On the Dominance Partial Ordering of Dyck Paths, Journal of Integer Sequences, Vol. 9 (2006), Article 06.2.5.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
Vinokur A. B., Huffman trees and Fibonacci numbers, Kibernetika Issue 6 (1986) 9-12 (in Russian); English translation in Cybernetics 21, Issue 6 (1986), 692-696.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 4..1000
Simon Plouffe, Approximations de séries génératrices et quelques conjectures, Dissertation, Université du Québec à Montréal, 1992.
Simon Plouffe, 1031 Generating Functions and Conjectures, Université du Québec à Montréal, 1992.
Alex Vinokur, Fibonacci connection between Huffman codes and Wythoff array, E-print
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,0,-1)
maple: with(combinat):a:=n->sum(fibonacci(j),j=3..n): seq(a(n),n=2..34); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Oct 03 2007A006327:=(2+z)/(z-1)/(z**2+z-1); [Conjectured by _Simon Plouffe_ in his 1992 dissertation.]
